system.usedWith: SP/Bolt: Shotguns, Shotgun Pistols, shotcannons, bolt pistols, bolters.
system.damageOrEffect: Does 2d10 E Pen 0 Damage, if target takes damage suffers effects as if set on fire. Each hit reduces AP by 1 (down to min 0) until repaired.
